title: Sleeping beauty
creator_credit: Walt Disney, Walt Disney Productions and Clyde Geronimi
brief_description: Once upon a time, in a kingdom far away, a beautiful princess was born, destined by a terrible curse to be drawn into a spectacular adventure of unparalleled suspense and fantasy. Experience the joy and magic of this thrilling Disney classic. Features the voices of Mary Costa, Bill Shirley, Eleanor Audley, Verna Felton, Barbara Luddy, Bill Thompson.
